thread.title: Love Traveling and Love Airwheel SUV 2 wheel self balancing scooter S5
thread.title_full: Love Traveling and Love Airwheel SUV 2 wheel self balancing scooter S5

title: Love Traveling and Love Airwheel SUV 2 wheel self balancing scooter S5
text: Love Traveling and Love Airwheel SUV 2 wheel self balancing scooter S5 , 25 September 2015 -- For people who are fond of outings and self-challenging, Airwheel intelligent self-balancing scooter will be an ideal company for traveling.In the times with rapid technological development, there are more and more people choosing to ride intelligent self-balancing scooters for outings. Some experts even predict that the novel and unique transport tool will be popularized like smart phones. During rush hours, there will be all kinds of people riding intelligent self-balancing scooters on the streets, just as they drive private cars once before. Intelligent self-balancing scooter is more than a commuting tool and it could also be a hobby. There is such a group of people who like to get close to nature and challenge nature. Airwheel Technology has now released a new product which could appeal to such a group of people. What is the most important factor for outdoor traveling? The answer must be power. Airwheel two-wheel intelligent scooter S5 has strong power, since the performance of the electrical motor has been highly enhanced. Its instantaneous power could reach up to 1500 W. The robust power enables S5 to conquer any kind of road conditions, from the bump road, abrupt slope to soft grass. It passes through them as gently and smoothly as through firm ground. The off-road capability of S5 is also reflected on its wheel designing. Airwheel S5 is customized with 16-inch Chen Shin tires. The wheel hub of S5 is larger than that of any previous electric scooters. The tire with special tread pattern design has good adaptability to different road conditions. All these features ensure that S5 could serve as an authentic outdoor SUV scooter. Another feature which guarantees S5â€™s SUV performance is the battery life. For urban dwellers, they go outings for recreational purpose. They wish to have more fun and free from the limit of time and space. Airwheel which always pursues the best user experience will not let people down in this respect. Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter S5 boasts the largest battery capacity of 680 WH among all Airwheel products. In road tests, the longest distance S5 could cover is 45 to 50 km after a full charge. For people who are fond of outings and self-challenging, Airwheel intelligent self-balancing scooter S5 will be an ideal company. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world. Media contact: Company Name: Airwheel Technology Holding (USA) Co., Ltd Contact Person: Mr Tang Address: 5000 Katy Mills Cir. Unt 745, Katy, TX 77494, USA E-mail:
